page.title: 12DEEPING ST.JAMES-LIONS
page.content: They raise money for any charity that needs help.The most money that was raised was Â£1105.It was raised at Christmas time.That money went to charity.They do any service that will help people.They take children to places for short holidays.If there is a big event they start to plan about a year before the actual thing. At Christmas time the Lions go round the streets with a life size papier mache reindeer to raise money. They give lollies to the smaller child -ren when they put money into the collecting tubs.Apart from Rudolf there are other Christmas characters like Snowmen and Santa Claus.They have music coming out of a couple of speak- ers which are in the sleigh, which is towed by a car with Rudolf on the roof.The generater is disguised as a chimney.
